alert.note: Alert for Crisp; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 10:40AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Dodge, Wilcox and southeastern Crisp Counties through 1115 AM EDT... At 1039 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Union to near Rochelle to near Hatley, and moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Cordele, Abbeville, Rochelle, Milan, Arabi, Rhine, Pitts, East Crisp, Cedar Creek, Antioch Church, Seville, Hatley, Browning, Double Run, Wenona and Owensboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
